solution_line_template: A set of {num_spoons_in_set} spoons costs ${total_cost_7_spoons}, so one spoon from the set costs {total_cost_7_spoons} / {num_spoons_in_set} = $<<{total_cost_7_spoons}/{num_spoons_in_set}={cost_per_spoon}>>{cost_per_spoon}.
So if sold separately, {num_spoons_to_buy} spoons would cost {num_spoons_to_buy} * {cost_per_spoon} = $<<{num_spoons_to_buy}*{cost_per_spoon}={cost_of_5_spoons}>>{cost_of_5_spoons}.
